flawed_nl_solution:
The 7th graders average GPA is 2 more than the 6th graders GPA of 93 so 93+2 = 95
If you combine the GPA for all three grades then they have 93+95+91 = <<93+95+91=279>>279
The average GPA for the school is 279/3 = <<279/3=39>>39
#### 39

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 93, not 39. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
